狐假虎威.definition: lit. the fox exploits the tiger's might (idiom); fig. to use powerful connections to intimidate people

狐女.definition: fox lady; in folk stories, a beautiful girl who will seduce you then reveal herself as a ghost

狐朋狗友.definition: a pack of rogues (idiom); a gang of scoundrels

狐狸.definition: fox; fig. sly and treacherous person

狐狸尾巴.definition: lit. fox's tail (idiom); visible sign of evil intentions; to reveal one's evil nature; evidence that reveals the villain

狐群狗黨.definition: a skulk of foxes, a pack of dogs (idiom); a gang of rogues
